meanings.definition: Not attracting attention or causing disturbance
meanings.sent1: The cat moved with unobtrusiveness through the room.
meanings.sent2: Her unobtrusiveness allowed her to observe without being noticed.
meanings.sent3: The ninja's unobtrusiveness was so impressive that even the dog didn't detect him.
meanings.sent4: The unobtrusiveness of the chameleon's color-changing ability is remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The unobtrusiveness of the librarian made her the perfect spy.

meanings.definition: The quality of being inconspicuous or discreet
meanings.sent1: The unobtrusiveness of the painting made it blend seamlessly with the decor.
meanings.sent2: His unobtrusiveness in the meeting allowed him to gather valuable information unnoticed.
meanings.sent3: The unobtrusiveness of the squirrel stealing birdseed was both sneaky and cute.
meanings.sent4: The unobtrusiveness of the moon behind the clouds gave the night an eerie feel.
meanings.sent5: The unobtrusiveness of the spy's movements made him a master of espionage.
